title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water. In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy. Beat eggs and mix with cheese. Combine spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat. Stir in egg mixture quickly. Serve with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Cook onions, garlic, and ginger in a pan. Add tomatoes and spices, then chicken. Simmer until cooked. Garnish with cilantro.
